sense.name: a follower, enthusiast, aficionado of some activity or person
sense.examples: He is a loyal Red Sox fan. The actor signed autographs for his fans. I became a big fan of backing up my computer after it crashed once. Science fiction fans will love that movie.

sense.name: a device for creating a movement of air
sense.examples: I bought two silk Japanese fans. This electric fan doesn't cool the room very well. Flying birds sometimes get sucked into the fans of jet engines.
